name: 觉梦：赛博
description: Sin descripción

name: Egg Up
description: You need to get the egg to the top. To get your egg to the top, jump from platform to platform. Some platforms have red bounce pads allowing the egg to jump much higher. Some platforms contain diamonds that the player can collect while bouncing to the top of the level. Simple in concept yet very addictive, this game will ask for your best skills to succeed! Get it up!

name: VR Future Wars: Aircraft Carrier-UAV Confrontation
description: It's time to show off your superb flying skills. Put on a VR helmet and you will act as an air force, fly a top fighter, and defend the aircraft carrier alone and annihilate the enemy.

name: Kids: Farm Puzzle
description: Kids: Farm Puzzle offers unique fun and relaxing jigsaw puzzles! The game shows you cute pictures of farm animals, which can be divided into different numbers of pieces to make your challenge easier or harder.

name: Pictooi
description: Welcome to Pictooi, a relaxing logic puzzle game where you fill in cells to solve puzzles and reveal pictures. Professor Ishida is your host, mentor, and friend. "Oh, hello! Did you know your brain is kind of like a muscle? Let's exercise your brain by challenging it with logic puzzles. Solving logic puzzles can expand your mind! I look forward to sharing our journey together." - Professor Ishida Approachable: Suitable for beginners and experienced nonogram lovers. Pictooi features 300 logic puzzles, ranging from easy to challenging, across board sizes of 5x5, 10x10, 15x15, and 20x20.

name: World War 2: Operation Husky
description: WW2 Operation Husky is easy to learn. 24 scenarios, Paratroopers, Tanks, Infantries, Anti-Aircraft, Artillery Support, Air Support. Hills, Light and Dense forest. Single and Multi-players. PC or Mac. 4K and Touch Screen.

name: Revizor
description: "Revizor" is a visual novel, a simulator of an office employee. You can flirt with colleagues at work, go on dates, earn and spend money, do business, meet friends, conduct audits, get sick and heal, listen to the radio with exclusive tracks, make decisions, run errands, and much more!

name: Within the Blade
description: Within the Blade is an epic game in stealth, platforming, and RPG genres, in which the player takes on the role of a Ninja. Explore the scenic world of feudal Japan, using your stealth to complete missions. Collect various materials to craft weapons: shurikens, poisons, elixirs, grenades, mines. As well as the main weapon the Ninjato and Kusarigama to build your power. In 1560 A.D – Japan’s last Shogunate has lost full control over the realm, causing a plunge into a massive civil war. All hope lies within the ninja clan "Black Lotus" to sabotage and defend against the forces of the villain and his demonic allies. The warlord must be assassinated. Do you have the ninja skills to save medieval Japan from a reign terror?

name: Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition
description: Space Hulk: Deathwing &ndash Enhanced Edition - Deluxe, includes the base game and the Official Soundtrack.

name: Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition: Infested Mines
description: Enjoy free new content for Space Hulk: Deathwing – Enhanced Edition! Lead your squad through dark, xenos-filled corridors and caverns in the imposing new environments of the Infested Mines. This DLC is free for all Space Hulk: Deathwing – Enhanced Edition owners.

name: Cardpocalypse: Out of Time
description: Cardpocalypse: Out of Time is a standalone adventure for Cardpocalypse set within the final day of Jess’ first week at her new school. This is a whole new standalone campaign! Build your collection and change the rules once more. Test your card gaming skills against a series of new enemy champions. Stuck in a time loop? Have some fun! Find new combos! Bloop, a special neutral champion, can use cards from every faction, and has a unique upgrade tree to explore. Build the Champion you want!

name: Project Hospital: Traumatology Department
description: Project Hospital - Traumatology Department contains 35 different diagnoses and comes with helicopter, new specialized equipment, wheelchairs, sandbox level and new events!

name: Project Hospital: Hospital Services
description: Hospital Services expansion pack introduces Administrative department with pharmacy, cafeteria, janitor management, staff training and visitors. Pathology department allows you to figure out what went wrong with your lost cases.

name: Project Hospital: Department of Infectious Diseases
description: Project Hospital - Department of Infectious Diseases contains 65 different diagnoses and comes with new specialized equipment, isolation ward, new ambulance, sandbox level, events and outbreaks!

name: Project Hospital: Doctor Mode
description: Doctor Mode brings a new game mode to Project Hospital - take over your doctors and oversee their cases, use new handy visualizations of your patient's conditions and activities. Create your own employees in character editor! New equipment for your doctor's offices and more variety in character portraits.

name: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Tomb Kings
description: This content is included with the Season Pass for Warhammer: Chaosbane. Explore the desolate land of Nehekhara and fight the forces of the Tomb Kings. This new act includes an original story arc, unique environments and new enemies.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 - DLC pack 2

name: Shortest Trip to Earth: The Old Enemies
description: The second DLC for Shortest Trip to Earth adds over 20 new enemy ships across 3 major new factions to the original game. Explore 10 additional planets with their own unique game-changing events and take command of a new playable ship - The Exception.

name: Animation Arts Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Siege Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Hearts of Iron III: DLC Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Machineboy Complete Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Retro First Friday Collection #1
description: Sin descripción

name: Fatal Twelve: Complete Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - Dropship Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - Heroes of the Inner Sphere
description: Follow your chosen career path from War Dog to Treasure Hunter in the new Career Mode. Explore new warzones, new quests, new missions that span the full breadth of the Inner Sphere. Find new mech chassis and variants, new weapons, new equipment, and unlock upgrades.

name: Ball Brawl 3D
description:
The most amusing soccer game ever. There is no foul or red card!

Slide tackle your opponents, grab the ball and watch them fly away!

name: Leaving
description: Leaving is an psychological horror from the first person with puzzle elements. The game is inspired by the legends and horror stories of the afterlife. The script was written by the writer Aina's Way.

name: A Day of Maintenance
description:
A Day of Maintenance is a new, unusual kind of exploration game, taking cues from In Other Waters, 17776, Signal from Tolva, and Euro Truck Simulator 2.

It's a mixture of a visual novel, driving game, crane game, fixing game, and some other stuff too.

name: Cryptid Crush
description:
Haunted. Cursed. Single.

You arrive in the seaside town of Longhope surrounded by monsters of urban myth- including your Mothman best friend, Atlas, and Jamie, the wingless Jersey Devil. Test your luck in love and life as you form bonds with the denizens (living, dead, and demonic) of Longhope.

name: Berserk: Vulcanites Unleashed
description: Berserk is a fast paced TCG/CCG set in the VulcanVerse lore. Battle against other players in competitive 1v1 matches, climb the ladder and participate in awesome seasons for a chance to unlock prizes. Play on PC, iPhone or Android devices.

name: Astro Colony
description: Explore endless Universe and create the most efficient constellation of colonies. Build conveyor systems to automate production. Take care of Astronauts and their needs! Establish new colonies as part of intergalactic simulation.

name: Pinewood Computer Core
description: Explore a secret underground facility that's about to explode! Your mission is to keep a huge supercomputer reactor from overheating. Or is it? You decide! Explore every corner of the facility, drive trains, survive disasters, press every button, discover secrets, and you may just make it out alive!

name: Don't Starve: Shipwrecked - Console Edition
description:
In Don't Starve: Shipwrecked, Wilson finds himself stranded in a tropical archipelago. He must learn to survive all over again in this new environment filled with new biomes, seasons, and creatures.

Don’t let the tropical breeze lull you into a false sense of security - the world might be different, but it is still equal parts unforgiving and uncompromising. You will quickly find these islands are full to the brim with things that want to kill you.

name: Don't Starve: Hamlet - Console Edition
description:
In Don’t Starve: Hamlet, Wilson discovers a lost town of aristocratic Pigmen nestled within a foreboding tropical jungle.
Can you readjust to society as an outsider? Can you earn fame and riches recovering lost relics? Will you weather the Aporkalypse?

name: Agar.cc
description: A faster paced, more aggressive variant of the popular multiplayer browser game, Agar.io. In this version you can rapid fire spit mass, or grow your mass quickly using viruses. Team up with your friends to dominate the universe, or play alone and show off your solo skills.

name: Marvel's Avengers: Cosmic Cube
description: The time to wrest control of the Cosmic Cube from Monica Rappaccini has come in the new Villain Sector mission “Beating the Odds.” But the weapon’s immense power has made her an even greater threat, requiring the Avengers to use their wits and heroic powers to defeat her solo or in teams of up to four players. This Villain Sector continues the storyline from Marvel’s Avengers Operation: Hawkeye - Future Imperfect and sets the stage for upcoming releases.

name: Re:Run
description: A short action/parkour/powerup game by YouTuber Dani with interesting locomotion and game mechanics.

name: Jelly Juggle
description: Jelly Juggle is a frenetic take on circular pong. It's an extreme sport for your thumb.

name: Chunithm Amazon
description: The Seventh game in the hit rhythm game by Sega

name: Chunithm Amazon Plus
description: The eigth game in the hit rhythm game series by Sega

name: Space Punks
description: A top-down looter shooter, Space Punks features crazy, over-the-top action in a unique, irreverent sci-fi setting. Players are given the chance to blast their way to fame, glory and wealth by taking on lucrative contracts on far-flung planets against impossible odds.

name: Chunithm Crystal Plus
description: The tenth game in the hit rhythm game series by Sega

name: Chunithm Paradise
description: The eleventh game in the hit rhythm game series by Sega

name: Chunithm Paradise Lost
description: The twelfth game in the hit rhythm game series by Sega

name: MergeCrafter
description:
MergeCrafter is a unique tycoon game where you bring the best talents to unlock and merge on new lands. Play all the puzzles and learn new merge mechanics to discover new Biomes!

Tap, Build & Merge! Lead your empire in the best puzzle game available. Conquer Runaria with your own 3D pixel block simulator!

name: Chunithm Super Star
description: A South Eastern Asia (international) entry in the chunithm series. It borrows graphic assets from Chunithm Star, contains songs and engine from Chunithm Crystal and has unique events and story.

name: Ongeki Plus
description: An append version to the first installment of the ongeki series

name: Call Me Under
description: Dive into the 1950s and explore an eldritch-horror infested world soaked in dark magic, mystery, and romance. Call Me Under takes place in the mysterious underwater city of Styx, a haven inhabited by humans, sirens, and a host of unknown otherworldly entities.

name: Ongeki Summer Plus
description: Append version of Ongeki Summer

name: Kinkoi: Golden Loveriche
description:
Noble Private Academy.
An institution where future men and women of great wealth are cultivated.
It is a boarding school where students aren't merely educated, but also taught dignity.

This year, a sense of urgency hangs over the academy as a member of a royal family from a faraway Northern European country has been invited to attend.

In an unexpected turn, the princess takes a liking to our protagonist, Ichimatsu Ouro, and he is forced to attend Noble Academy alongside her.
That is when he ends up crammed into a vacant room in a nook of the women's dormitory...

name: Ongeki Red
description: The third entry in Sega's gatcha rhythm arcade game series.

name: Ongeki Red Plus
description: Append version of Ongeki Red

name: Reina & Jericho
description: Help Reina battle her way through labyrinthine halls, overcome fierce adversaries, and acquire powerful artifacts in Reina & Jericho. Manipulate time to create the sequence of events that will allow Reina to rescue Jericho and attain her freedom. Uncover the truth about her friends and enemies in a story-driven action-exploration adventure full of tight melee combat and fast-paced platforming.

name: Barony: Myths & Outcasts
description: Adventure through the Barony dungeons as the evil monster races and all new classes, providing dozens of new gameplay combinations. Or play with a monster skin, just for fun! Play with others whether or not they own this DLC.

name: Thief: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Reassembly: Fields Expansion
description: Fields Expansion contains new building blocks, introduces gravity-based environmental elements and new orbital mechanics, essential utility functions for tactical gameplay, and seven additional music tracks by producer and composer peakssound.

name: Steel Division 2: Back to War Pack
description: Play with the most powerful Units & Divisions from Normandy in Steel Division 2! This pack, featuring 4 additional nations, 8 divisions and 350+ new units is completely free for Steel Division: Normandy 44 owners!

name: Steel Division 2: Reinforcement Pack #1
description: Two Brand-New Divisions, new Units and 2 new Aces join the Eastern Front in the first Free DLC for Steel Division 2! Part of our 10 Free DLC program, this first pack also features a brand-new map and two new epic music tracks!

name: Steel Division 2: Tribute to D-Day Pack
description: Celebrate Operation Overlord with the Steel Division 2 DLC: Tribute to D-Day. The expansion brings 6 divisions from Steel Division: Normandy 44, including the Polish 1st Armored Division and 3. Fallschirmjäger-Division. Play with units such as the M18 Hellcat, Cromwell, “Beute” Firefly and more!

name: Steel Division 2: Reinforcement Pack #2
description: Expand Steel Division 2 for Free with this second DLC, featuring a brand-new Skirmish map: Gora Kalwaria, playable in every game mode in solo, multiplayer and coop!

name: Steel Division 2: Reinforcement Pack #3
description: Expand Steel Division 2 for Free with this third DLC, featuring a brand-new Skirmish map: Zbuczyn, playable in every game mode in solo, multiplayer and coop!

name: Steel Division 2: Reinforcement Pack #4
description: Expand Steel Division 2 for Free with this second DLC, featuring a brand-new Skirmish map: Brest, West, playable in every game mode in solo, multiplayer and coop!

name: Steel Division 2: Reinforcement Pack #5
description: Brand-New commanding tools and Two new music tracks are in this fifth Free DLC for Steel Division 2!

name: Steel Division 2: Death on the Vistula
description: Steel Division 2 - Death on the Vistula expands the original game with tons of new content in solo, coop and multiplayer, including a new massive Army General turn-based strategic campaign, 4 new Divisions, 200+ new units, 4 new historical battles and 2 exclusives aces!

name: Steel Division 2: The Fate of Finland
description: Steel Division 2 - The Fate of Finland is the second expansion for the popular and expansive World War 2 RTS set on the Eastern Front. The DLC adds a large amount of new content, including a new Army General strategic campaign, 6 new Divisions, 200+ units, 2 new Aces, and 2 new Historical Battles!

name: Steel Division 2: Black Sunday
description: Command a new nation in Steel Division 2’s third massive expansion, Black Sunday, and fight on Romania’s frontier in the summer of 1944. Experience 2 new Army General campaigns and play with 6 new Divisions, including new Romanian, 150 new units, 2 new Aces, 15 new Camouflage skins, and more!

name: Steel Division 2: Burning Baltics
description: Lead the Axis to victory in Steel Division 2: Burning Baltics, the History Expansion featuring the German counter-offensive, Operation Doppelkopf. Command 8 new Divisions, including the elite "Grossdeutschland", 120+ new units, 2 new Nations and 2 new Aces!

name: Steel Division 2: Reinforcement Pack #10 - Tannenberg
description: Extend the Steel Division 2 experience with this DLC #10, featuring a brand new tactical map playable in 10v10!

name: Steel Division 2: Commander Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Steel Division 2: Total Conflict Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Steel Division 2: General Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Warcraft I & II Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Indivisible: Razmi Challenges
description: Razmi got bored in Ajna's inner realm and constructed a series of devilish challenges to humiliate her best fiend with! These challenges require a combination of Ajna's skills that will push her to the very limit, and test her ability to work together with her companions against insurmountable odds in battle. There's a prize at the end of it! Well, Razmi says there is, anyway...

name: Iratus: Lord of the Dead - Wrath of the Necromancer
description: Content expansion to Iratus: Lord of the Dead. Includes new minions, bosses, enemies and story content.

name: Master of Magic: Caster of Magic
description: After 25 years Master of Magic gets a DLC! Explore new strategies and experience Master of Magic at its best with Caster of Magic, a new DLC that adds dozens of options and tons of content to the base game.

name: Master of Magic: Caster of Magic for Windows
description: Caster of Magic, the community update to the classic Master of Magic, is brought to the modern era with Caster of Magic for Windows.

name: PC Building Simulator: Republic of Gamers Workshop
description: Created in collaboration with ASUS, this new workshop for PC Building Simulator is a slick and modern alternate workspace ideal for any Republic of Gamers fan.

name: PC Building Simulator: Razer Workshop
description: Designed in collaboration with Razer, this new workshop for PC Building Simulator is a great alternate workspace for any Razer fan.

name: PC Building Simulator: Aorus Workshop
description: This is your chance to build PCs in the top secret PC and robotic development facility of the renowned Aorus gaming brand!

name: PC Building Simulator: Nzxt Workshop
description: A brand new workshop for PC Building simulator created with Nzxt's design team. Ideal for fans of the brand, and for anyone who digs the colour purple.

name: PC Building Simulator: Esports Expansion
description: Be the unsung hero of every Esports team – the tech support! Build PCs for elite esports players in a new career mode for the hit PC building game. Start with a humble team, and rise up the ranks as you juggle demands from players, sponsors and the team manager. PC building just went up a notch!

name: PC Building Simulator: GOG Galaxy Edition Case
description: Sin descripción

name: PC Building Simulator: Evga Workshop
description: Welcome to the brand new Evga workshop inspired by the Evga Game Arena. Build and test cutting edge PCs, customise your supersized display, and check out the interactive GPU exhibits.

name: PC Building Simulator: Overclockers UK Workshop
description: Build your PCs in the HQ of Overclockers UK – the legendary PC shop and home of world-famous overclocker 8Pack.

name: Cultist Simulator: The Exile
description: In the occult underworld of 1920s Europe, the reckoner mobs traffic in the most precious commodity imaginable: life. You were one of them. Now you're on the run. Disappear into the mists of the invisible world. Build a new, secret life elsewhere. Or choose defiance, and attempt the impossible.
